scripts.start: npm run setup:client && npm run build -w @holochain/scaffolding-generators -w @holochain/scaffolding-types -w @holochain/scaffolding-ui && concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @holochain/scaffolding-ui && npm run build:watch -w @holochain/scaffolding-generators && npm run build:watch -w @holochain/scaffolding-types" "npm start -w @holochain/create"
scripts.build: npm run setup:client && npm run build -w @holochain/scaffolding-generators && npm run build -w @holochain/scaffolding-types && npm run build -w @holochain/scaffolding-ui && npm run build -w @holochain/create
scripts.setup:client: rimraf packages/client/public/templates && mkdir packages/client/public/templates && npm run setup:svelte && npm run setup:lit && npm run setup:vue
